Blog.post: We have a half a day of school left! yay! over the summer, im an LIT (leader in training for the district of queens) i aslo have lawn mowing jobs, maybe babysitting jobs, and the LIT junk. also, im bored. w00t. if your blue and you dont know where to go then why dont you go where fashion sits... somthin sumthin sumthin........ any way bye. (insert subliminal message here.)

havent posted in a wile. Go to WWW.FLASHPLAYER.COM and watch BOB THE BALL episode 1 and 2. After school mme. allen gave me a lecture on how "crap" was a swear word and the lowest people in society swear! Well...................FUCKSHITPUSSYBITCHASSWHOREHOOKERPISSBASTARD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Well, glad i got that off my chest. Neil,neil. my god. at school he tried ramping over a dirt pile on a mountain bike (wich he never did before) and broke his wrist bones and his radius. that was stupid. no offense neil. any way thats it for today.
Play the song ANOTHER ONE BITES THE DUST BACKWARDS! its cool! it says..... ITS FUN TO SMOKE MARIJUANA ITS FUN TO SMOKE MARIJUANA! yeah, TYLERS DIFFERENT. thats it. w00t

i made a blog with my frend michiel. his bolog is moolcool.blogspot.com. to anyone reading. FAMILY GUY rules! i m fucked up!!! hahahahahahaha! but seriously this is my blog. Watch TOOTIEBUSTER. its not done yet,but for more info go to www.geocities.com/moolcool2002 ! it will be messed up awesome haha.. lol.... yay

According to urlLink Alex Borstein's website Family Guy's forth season is set to air from June 2005. I am so happy !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! havent posted in a while. " The Butterfly Effect" rules! watch it!it kicked ass i crapped........haha fooled ya w00t urlLink www.flashplayer.com

Yeah i dont think i posted in a while but summer rules. Sherbrooke lake camp wus kool, but long lake was better. SHOUTOUTS TO ANYONE THAT I MET THERE, except mullet girl........eeeww.The new ALEXISONFIRE cd is awesome too. buy it. its called "watch out". I was at my nanny's and rushed to my friends house to stay over night. i just bought KILL BILL Vol. 2 about an hour or two ago. i cant wait to watch it. i forget wut else i was gonna talk about. anyway so long!!!! !w00t!
